It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 42 43 #ifdef _GLIBCXX_DEBUG 44 45 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 46 void 47 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 48 assert_valid(const char* __file, int __line) const 49 { 50 debug_base::check_size(m_num_used_e, __file, __line); 51 assert_entry_pointer_array_valid(m_entries, __file, __line); 52 } 53 54 PB_DS_CLASS_T_DEC 55 void 56 PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC:: 57 assert_entry_pointer_array_valid(const entry_pointer_array a_p_entries, 58 const char* __file, int __line) const 59 { 60 size_type iterated_num_used_e = 0; 61 for (size_type pos = 0; pos < m_num_e; ++pos) 62 { 63 entry_pointer p_e = a_p_entries[pos]; 64 while (p_e != 0) 65 { 66 ++iterated_num_used_e; 67 assert_entry_pointer_valid(p_e, traits_base::m_store_extra_indicator, 68 __file, __line); 69 p_e = p_e->m_p_next; 70 } 71 } 72 PB_DS_DEBUG_VERIFY(iterated_num_used_e == m_num_used_e); 73 } 74 75 #include <ext/pb_ds/detail/cc_hash_table_map_/debug_store_hash_fn_imps.hpp> 76 #include <ext/pb_ds/detail/cc_hash_table_map_/debug_no_store_hash_fn_imps.hpp> 77 78 #endif 79 #endif
